title: Remove MCP setup from horizon init
description: Modify the horizon init command to no longer create or set up .vscode/mcp.json since MCP support has been removed.
notes: Removed MCP setup from horizon init command. Removed -m option and MCP config creation in full init.

title: Create VS Code extension with horizon agent tools
description: Develop a VS Code extension that registers horizon tools (create, update, list, add dependency, get ready work) as native agent tools, eliminating need for MCP or CLI commands. This provides clean tool calling interface for GitHub Copilot agents.
notes: Starting development of VS Code extension with horizon agent tools
